title: I just sent this ticket to riot.You guys think I have a shot?
body:
So long story short 6 months ago I got banned for third party software ( which to this day I swear i did NOT do).I tried to get unbanned numerous times and it has never worked.So desperation hit and I spent the last 30 minutes doing this:

> Dear gaming overlords of riot games,
this'll be the last ticket I ever send your ass
It's been six months and I'm still banned - Do I deserve it?
I know you got my last two tickets;
I wrote the details on 'em perfect
So this is my last plea I'm sending you, I hope you hear it
I've never cheated but if I have why you won't forgive it
Hey Riot, you talk about how players can reform
But you give them no second chances to perform
Don't get me wrong I am no salty  hater
I even made a picture that says me no cheater
Give this guy one last shot riot please unban
 Sincerely yours it's your biggest fan,this is Stan.

And here's the  [picture](https://gyazo.com/ade5e0ff39d59051aa0e58a6380706b6)

replies.body: Good luck dude but they won't unbann you. They can't even verify me as the owner of my 2k$ lost account.... Given them so much info but still they said can't verify you. Fuck this. 2k gone for no reason

At this point I'm just meming.I am 99% sure they won't unban me.I have tried in many civilized ways to explain to them that I haven't cheated but to no avail.Sorry for your account though buddy.Mine had about 500$ but you got screwed on another level.That's why ever since my ban I've not spent a penny on the game.
no ur toxic and deserve ban
nah riot is a bunch f monkeys
